name: @implementation/node-web
description: Reference implementation for NodeJS Web projects

scripts.serve:app: pnpm build && docker compose up -d && pm2 start --name node-app "tsx --env-file=.env ./src/app.ts"
scripts.serve:mocks: pm2 start --name node-mocks "pnpm --filter mocks serve" && pm2 start --name web-mocks "pnpm --filter mocks serve"
scripts.serve:stop: docker compose down && pm2 stop web-mocks node-app node-mocks && pm2 delete web-mocks node-app node-mocks
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm serve && playwright test; E2E_RESULT=$?; pnpm serve:stop; exit $E2E_RESULT
